posts.message: This is a separate extension, It's not developed by Ulauncher. You should go to the github page for extensions and follow their instructions, since some need additional dependencies etc.
posts.author: Albin Larsson

message: You have to make sure that fd is installed on your system for this to work. However, for some reason it is EXTREMELY slow through Ulauncher. Example: I searched for a file using "fd my_file.txt /" in the terminal, and fd found it in less than a second. Doing the same thing through Ulauncher results in me waiting many minutes for the result to show up, if it does at all. Makes this extension unusable -- please fix.
author: dain
